alert.note: Alert for Polk (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued June 25 at 9:51AM CDT until June 29 at 1:00AM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Grand Forks ND has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Minnesota... Red Lake River at Crookston affecting Polk County. .Heavy rainfall has contributed to rises on the Red Lake River at Crookston. No significant additional rainfall is expected over the next few days. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT TO EARLY WEDNESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Red Lake River at Crookston. * WHEN...From late tonight to early Wednesday morning. * IMPACTS...At 16.0 feet, Public Works begins 24 hour monitoring of pumps, gates, and valves. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:45 AM CDT Saturday the stage was 11.8 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late tonight to a crest of 16.0 feet early tomorrow afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage Monday evening. - Flood stage is 15.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Safety message - Turn around, don`t drown. Don`t travel through flooded areas. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
